像.definition: to resemble; to be like; to look as if; such as; appearance; image; portrait; image under a mapping (math.)

像模像樣.definition: solemn; presentable; decent; Taiwan pr. [xiang4 mo2 xiang4 yang4]

像章.definition: badge; insignia; lapel badge (e.g. with miniature portrait of great national leader)

像話.definition: proper; appropriate (mostly used in the negative or in a rhetorical question)

像那麽回事兒.pinyin: xiang4 na4 me5 hui2 shi4 r5
像那麽回事兒.definition: not bad at all; quite impressive
